welcome_message_body: Welcome to Inazawa, Japan! Get ready to experience the charm of our historic city, known for its beautiful cherry blossoms and traditional festivals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Inazawa has to offer.

restaurants.name: Marugame Seimen (丸亀製麺 稲沢店)
restaurants.description: Marugame Seimen (丸亀製麺 稲沢店) is a udon restaurant located in 稲沢市.

restaurants.name: 岐阜タンメン 一宮インター店
restaurants.description: 岐阜タンメン 一宮インター店 is a ramen restaurant located in 一宮市.

restaurants.name: ちゃんぽん家 大光楼
restaurants.description: ちゃんぽん家 大光楼 is a noodle restaurant located in 一宮市.
restaurants.address: 丹陽町伝法寺角野5123-2, 一宮市, 愛知県, 491-0822

restaurants.name: 岐阜タンメン 一宮インター2号店
restaurants.description: 岐阜タンメン 一宮インター2号店 is a ramen restaurant located in 一宮市.

restaurants.name: Sushiro (スシロー 一宮浅野店)
restaurants.description: Sushiro (スシロー 一宮浅野店) is a sushi restaurant located in 一宮市.
restaurants.address: 浅野字大西東63, 一宮市, 愛知県, 491-0871

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Komaki AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Komaki AFB Airport is used exclusively for military operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.
